high_descs: Turn around and walk back to the dresser along the wall.
Pick up the clock from the left side of the dresser.
Carry the clock and turn around, then left and find the desk.
Hold the clock and turn on the lamp that is on the left side of the desk.
anns.task_desc: Hold a clock and turn on a lamp.

high_descs: Turn around and walk over to the small dresser.
Pick up the alarm clock that is sitting on the dresser.
Turn around, walk a few steps, then turn left and head over to the desk.
Turn on the lamp that sits on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine an alarm clock by the light of a lamp.

high_descs: Turn right then turn right again and head to the dresser
Pick up the round container from the dresser
Turn around and go around the bed and head to the table
Turn on the lamp that is on the table
anns.task_desc: Examine the round container by the light of the table lamp
